acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused produced form jail.Heard learned lawyers of both sides on the point of ocsimination report.Considering physical apperance and report, the accused was below 18 years at the occurance of the incident..Let the case be transfered to the JJB,karbi Anglong Diphu for further proceeding.
